name: Off White
text: [Counter] Give up to 1 of your Leader or Characters Power +4000 for this battle. Then, look at the top 3 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 [Donquixote Pirates] type Character card and add it to your hand. Then, return the remaining cards to the bottom of your deck in your desired order.

effect.text: Give up to 1 of your Leader or Characters Power +4000 for this battle. Then, look at the top 3 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 [Donquixote Pirates] type Character card and add it to your hand. Then, return the remaining cards to the bottom of your deck in your desired order.
